title: How to Make an Origami House

steps.headline: Get a square piece of paper and fold in half to make a crease and unfold.
Then, fold both sides to meet the center line.
Now fold it in half vertically to make another crease and unfold.
After that, fold the top and bottom sides to the crease you made and unfold.
Then, open the top and flatten it.

text: Get a square piece of paper and fold in half to make a crease and unfold.  Then, fold both sides to meet the center line.  Now fold it in half vertically to make another crease and unfold.  After that, fold the top and bottom sides to the crease you made and unfold.  Then, open the top and flatten it.  Finally, decorate.  Finished.
